title: Build simplified LORDSON Edu foundation with student profiles and course management

requirements.text: Create student profile data structure in backend to store student ID, full name, date of birth, enrollment date, current grade level, and academic status (active/inactive)
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores student profiles with all specified fields
Student ID is unique and auto-generated
Academic status defaults to 'active' on creation

requirements.text: Create course data structure in backend to store course ID, course name, course code, description, credit hours, and assigned professor name

quotes: focusing on just student profiles and course management

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores courses with all specified fields
Course ID is unique and auto-generated
Course code is required and must be unique

requirements.text: Implement backend functions to create, read, update, and delete student profiles
acceptanceCriteria: Can create new student profiles
Can retrieve single student by ID and list all students
Can update student information
Can delete student profiles

requirements.text: Implement backend functions to create, read, update, and delete courses
acceptanceCriteria: Can create new courses
Can retrieve single course by ID and list all courses
Can update course information
Can delete courses

requirements.text: Create enrollment data structure in backend to link students to courses, storing enrollment ID, student ID, course ID, enrollment date, and current grade (optional until assigned)

quotes: course management with assignments and grades

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores enrollments linking students to courses
One student can enroll in multiple courses
Grade field is optional and can be updated later
Can query enrollments by student ID or course ID

requirements.text: Implement backend functions to enroll students in courses, retrieve enrollments by student or course, update grades, and remove enrollments
acceptanceCriteria: Can create new enrollments
Can retrieve all enrollments for a specific student
Can retrieve all enrollments for a specific course
Can update grades for enrollments
Can delete enrollments

requirements.text: Build frontend student management interface with a list view of all students showing name, ID, grade level, and status, with ability to add new students via a form
acceptanceCriteria: Displays table of students with key information
Includes button to open 'Add Student' form
Form collects all required student fields
Successfully creates student and updates list view

requirements.text: Build frontend course management interface with a list view of all courses showing course name, code, credits, and professor, with ability to add new courses via a form
acceptanceCriteria: Displays table of courses with key information
Includes button to open 'Add Course' form
Form collects all required course fields
Successfully creates course and updates list view

requirements.text: Build frontend student detail view that shows full student information and lists all courses the student is enrolled in with current grades
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a student from the list opens detail view
Shows all student profile fields
Displays enrolled courses with grades
Shows placeholder when no grades assigned yet

requirements.text: Build frontend enrollment interface to assign students to courses from either student detail view or course detail view
acceptanceCriteria: Can select student and course to create enrollment
Prevents duplicate enrollments
Shows confirmation when enrollment succeeds
Updates relevant views to show new enrollment

requirements.text: Create a creative, cohesive visual design theme for the education platform with professional styling appropriate for school administrators and educators, using warm, trustworthy colors and clear typography that ensures readability across dashboards and forms
acceptanceCriteria: All pages follow consistent color palette
Typography hierarchy is clear and professional
Layout patterns are consistent across views
Design feels appropriate for education context

constraints: Use Internet Identity for authentication, not custom username/password system
Backend must use single-actor architecture in main.mo
Do not implement real-time messaging features
Do not create mobile apps for App Store or Google Play
nonGoals: Multi-language support (English, French, Haitian Creole) - deferred to future iteration
Role-based dashboards for administrators, directors, professors - deferred to future iteration
Financial tracking - deferred to future iteration
Staff directories - deferred to future iteration
Assignment management - deferred to future iteration
Multi-tenant school separation - deferred to future iteration

required: Modern education platform hero banner showing diverse students collaborating (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
Simple graduation cap icon for student profiles (graduation-cap.dim_64x64.png)
Open book icon for course management (book-icon.dim_64x64.png)
